name: IP-ALOS
query:
SELECT 
    patient_name,
    admitted_datetime,
    discharge_datetime,
    DATEDIFF(discharge_datetime, admitted_datetime) AS total_days_stayed,
    NULL AS total_discharges,
    NULL AS total_length_of_stay,
    NULL AS average_length_of_stay
FROM 
    `tabInpatient Record`
WHERE 
    discharge_datetime IS NOT NULL
    AND status = 'Discharged'
    AND admitted_datetime BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    NULL AS patient_name,
    NULL AS admitted_datetime,
    NULL AS discharge_datetime,
    NULL AS total_days_stayed,
    COUNT(patient_name) AS total_discharges,
    SUM(DATEDIFF(discharge_datetime, admitted_datetime)) AS total_length_of_stay,
    ROUND(SUM(DATEDIFF(discharge_datetime, admitted_datetime)) * 1.0 / COUNT(patient_name), 2) AS average_length_of_stay
FROM 
    `tabInpatient Record`
WHERE 
    discharge_datetime IS NOT NULL
    AND status = 'Discharged'
    AND admitted_datetime BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s;
